firmware.name: HoneySens Docker Firmware
firmware.description: Dockerized sensor platform to be used on generic x86 systems

entry.desc: Fully reworked networking and logging as well as support for event caching, an adjustable service network range and deployment/update with Docker Compose
Fixed a bug that prevented service download through proxies
Support for remote server certificate updates
TLM proxy support via cntlm and disk usage reporting added. Requires server 1.0.0.
Initial release compatible with HoneySens server 1.0.x
